name: Hardpoint
description:
Hardpoint is an action top-down survival game that puts you in control of a cannon ambushed by waves of enemies, defend the objective and upgrade your gear. The game is currently at the very early stages of development, this means that nothing is final, and anything can and may be subject to change. Any feedback is appreciated.

New in version 0.2:

  • Wave system introduced. Defend against waves of enemies constantly getting stronger.
  • New enemy introduced; Light tanks have weak armor but do heavy damage.
  • Added base support for an in-game currency.
  • Fixed a bug where enemy projectiles would block the cannon shell, making the game very painful.
  • Nerfed infantry damage, Bullets shouldn't do that much damage.
